title: Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/21
itunes:title: Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/21
description:
George Noory and Sir Charles Shults III explore the continuing efforts to send human settlers to Mars in the near future, if fossils discovered on the planet prove there were already advanced civilizations living there, plus technological advances to protect Earth from getting hit by asteroids.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A discussion on the search for life on the red planet.
